text: Neoxyletobius is a genus of death-watch and spider beetles in the family Ptinidae. There are at least two described species in Neoxyletobius. ==Species== These two species belong to the genus Neoxyletobius: * Neoxyletobius kirkaldyi (Perkins, 1910) * Neoxyletobius oculatus (Sharp, 1881) ==References== ==Further reading== * * * * * * Category:Ptinidae
title: Neoxyletobius
